Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. hit a tiebreaking single in a four-run eighth inning
Tommy Pham hit a slow four-hopper to Brooks Lee and reached on an infield hit
Pinch-runner Dairon Blanco scored on an error by the shortstop
MJ Melendez drove in Pham with a two-out single off Jax
Post-Match Reflections: That's what you dream of, those are the moments you want to be in. You've just got to control what you can control and just get a good pitch. You just have to be there in the moment. — Bobby Witt Jr.
The quality of at-bats against Duran was outstanding. We've seen these guys never give up. The pitching kept us in the game. — Matt Quatraro, Kansas City manager
When you've got a two-run lead in the eighth inning, you should win the game. Period. — Rocco Baldelli, Twins manager
Miscellaneous Highlights: Duran, who topped 100 mph with five of 17 pitches
Lucas Erceg pitched a perfect ninth for his 10th save, his seventh since the Royals acquired him from Oakland at the July trade deadline
